source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_000<tab>What do you want with me, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>?
TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_A1_000_002<tab>What can you tell me about Terncliff?

TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_001<tab>Me? Not much to tell, and even less worth knowing. These days, I go about my daily business trying not to bother anyone. Just another sad old man, all alone and dying of...well, I doubt you'd care even if I told you.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_001<tab>Mon nom ne vous serait d'aucune utilité... Je ne suis qu'un vieillard amer, condamné à finir ses jours à se lamenter sur ses crimes passés.

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_002<tab>Used to call myself a doctor, not that I was much good at it. When the epidemic came ten years ago, I was powerless to stop it, despite all my years of experience and fancy medicines. For every one I saved, I lost a dozen more.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_002<tab>Jadis, j'étais médecin... Cependant, je pense avoir sacrifié plus de vies que je n'en ai sauvées... Et tout par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>rement pendant l'épidémie qui a fait rage ici il y a dix ans.

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_003<tab>Worse than that, I let those Garlean bastards push me around, tell me who to treat and who to leave to their fate. As a result, I only saw to the imperials, while my kith and kin died in agony.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_003<tab>J'ai suivi les ordres des Garlemaldais à la lettre, le peu de médicaments que j'avais ne devait être administré qu'aux citoyens de l'Empire. C'est ainsi que j'ai trahi et sacrifié mes compatriotes...

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_004<tab>Being far to the south of Werlyt, perched atop the cliffs, there was never much reason for anyone to travel here. Being by the sea is all well and good, but we're simply too high above the water to benefit much from it. The gulls and terns don't seem to mind, though.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_004<tab>Vous êtes à Rocasternes, une petite ville à la pointe sud de Werlyt.

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_005<tab>Most of the townsfolk are either Hyuran natives or Au Ra who found their way here over the years. They all lived side by side, peacefully enough, before the Garleans came and ruined everything.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_005<tab>À l'origine, cette bourgade est née d'une alliance entre les Hyurs du continent et quelques tribus aorannes venues par la mer. Tout du moins, jusqu'à l'arrivée des Garlemaldais...

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_006<tab>There wasn't much we could do to stop them. Those who fought back were soon put to the sword. Once the invasion was complete, the imperials started digging down into the rock and built a supply depot for their blasted airships. But the experiments were a more recent development.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_006<tab>Les Impériaux ont décidé de construire ici, au milieu de nulle part, une base de ra<var 16 /var>vi<var 16 /var>tail<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment pour leurs aéronefs. Et depuis quelques mois, ils ont commencé une série d'ex<var 16 /var>pé<var 16 /var>ri<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions étranges... Les rumeurs disent qu'ils étaient en train de concevoir un nouveau type de machines de guerre.

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_007<tab>Of course, none of us civilians were privy to what it was they were working on. I expect that'll all come to light now that the bastards have all turned and fled with their tails between their legs. We've got you and yours to thank for that, even if it is only a temporary respite.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_007<tab>Tous les soldats et ingénieurs de l'armée impériale étaient bien pressés de décamper après votre arrivée. Je me demande où ils se sont enfuis...

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_010<tab>After years of living under occupation, the youngsters banded together and kicked out those imperial bastards. But from what I hear, it was a group of orphans raised by a Garlean legatus who played a vital role in winning our independence. Alfonse, I think their leader was called...
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_010<tab>Grâce au dévouement des jeunes, le règne des Impériaux est enfin terminé<var 1D /var>! Ces soldats méritent d'être élevés au rang de héros. J'ai cru comprendre qu'ils étaient menés par un certain Alfonse...

source: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_011<tab><sigh> So many young lives lost... I wish I could give my life to spare one of them, but it's too late now. The only thing any of us can do is make the most of the freedom we've been given.
target: TEXT_REGOTH4WERLYTGUIDE_00685_REGRETOLDMAN00685_000_011<tab>Dire qu'un vieux croulant comme moi est encore en vie alors que ces enfants se sont sacrifiés pour notre liberté... À nous maintenant de faire honneur à leur mémoire et de reconstruire notre pays comme ils l'auraient souhaité...
